title: 83.4 (LOA)
content:
"Excellent. Let's trade!" Ren Kobo claps his hands and rubs them together. He goes to his hoversled and starts pulling out items. "Now, let's see if I can find something to tickle your fancy."

Discard Ren Kobo. Each Ranger may return a gear from their hand to the collection. If they did, they then choose a starting gear card from the collection for which they meet the aspect requirement and add it to their hand. (This alteration to their deck is permanent.)

If you don't trade with Ren Kobo, soothe 2 fatigue.
